page.title: 03A DAY FOR A GIRL IN CURY
page.content: I get out of bed, have a wash and get dressed. Then I go out to play with Paul. I ride my bike, catching or tigging them. About one o clock I go in for my dinner. I like chips and steak. After I play netball or cricket with my friends Paul and Vonea, who are both ten. My favourite game is netball. (I like drawing or painting as a hobby). Then I come in and watch television. I ilke watching the 'A'Team, but that is finished now. So now I watch 'Scarecrow and Mrs King'. I like watching cartoons and my favourite character is Dog Tanian. I go to bed at half past eight to nine and read for ten minutes. I like reading 'Charlie and the Chocolate Factory','The Famous Five' and 'Secret Seven'books. I mainly read in bed because I can concentrate better.
